title: 求一个1.15的凋零骷髅刷怪笼的指令
author: 小黄bobo666

replies.author: 樱千落妖精
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 樱千落妖精 于 2020-4-12 17:01 编辑 

give ID 52:51 数量?

不过放出来是个小白刷怪笼 放在地狱就出凋零了
当我没说 不支持数字ID

replies.author: xiang_xge
replies.txt_content:
给予物品（生存不可放置）：/give @p minecraft:spawner{BlockEntityTag:{SpawnData:{id:"minecraft:wither_skeleton"},SpawnPotentials:[{Weight:1,Entity:{id:"minecraft:wither_skeleton"}}]}} 1复制代码
放置方块（默认放置于站立位置，~可调为坐标）：/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:spawner{SpawnData:{id:"minecraft:wither_skeleton"},SpawnPotentials:[{Weight:1,Entity:{id:"minecraft:wither_skeleton"}}]} replace复制代码
